params.mintableAmount: The amount of ERC1155 tokens to be minted to the batch supplier

params._storage: Struct containing the current state used or modified by this function
params.initialTA: The initial time appreciation for the category. Category's averageTA will be set to this value.
params.tokenName: The name of the ERC20 token that will be created for the category
params.tokenSymbol: The symbol of the ERC20 token that will be created for the category

params.categoryId: The category ID to which the project belongs

params.categoryId: The category ID to be updated
params.decayPerSecond: The new decay per second for the category
params.maxDepreciation: The new max depreciation for the category. Quantified per year.
params.volumeCoefficient: The new volume coefficient for the category
